title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2023

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: Jack O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. 

Jack O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department 
of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 jack donnell particular whose address deposited office department agriculture food marine appointed special adviser pippa hackett minister state department agriculture food marine effect 17 december 2022

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Declan O’Rourke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Declan O’Rourke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department 
of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 March, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [153] 3
